title: List of historic vanilla NetHack tiles
data:
These are [tiles](/wiki/Tiles "Tiles") that were distributed with [NetHack 3.2.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.0 "NetHack 3.2.0"), the first version to support tiles, and are substantially different from their [counterparts](/wiki/List_of_vanilla_NetHack_tiles "List of vanilla NetHack tiles") in [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3").

All of these tiles remained in use through [NetHack 3.2.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.3 "NetHack 3.2.3"), and some remained in use through [NetHack 3.3.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.1 "NetHack 3.3.1").

Each tile is shown with its modern counterpart to the right, if that tile has been uploaded. The Wizard of Balance is the former [Wizard](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest") leader, and is succeeded by [Neferet the Green](/wiki/Neferet_the_Green "Neferet the Green").

| [![Healer 320.png](/images/9/93/Healer_320.png)](/wiki/File:Healer_320.png)                                  | [![Healer.png](/images/6/62/Healer.png)](/wiki/File:Healer.png)                                  | [healer](/wiki/Healer "Healer")                                  | [![Priest 320.png](/images/3/39/Priest_320.png)](/wiki/File:Priest_320.png)                | [![Priest.png](/images/1/14/Priest.png)](/wiki/File:Priest.png)                | [priest](/wiki/Priest "Priest")                | [![Priestess 320.png](/images/1/11/Priestess_320.png)](/wiki/File:Priestess_320.png) | [![Priestess.png](/images/b/bc/Priestess.png)](/wiki/File:Priestess.png) | [priestess](/wiki/Priestess "Priestess") |

See the [page history](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=List_of_historic_vanilla_NetHack_tiles\&action=history) for a list of who changed it, and on what dates.
html:
List of historic vanilla NetHack tiles

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

These are tiles that were distributed with NetHack 3.2.0, the first version to support tiles, and are substantially different from their counterparts in NetHack 3.4.3.

All of these tiles remained in use through NetHack 3.2.3, and some remained in use through NetHack 3.3.1.

Each tile is shown with its modern counterpart to the right, if that tile has been uploaded. The Wizard of Balance is the former Wizard Quest leader, and is succeeded by Neferet the Green.

MONSTERS

mind flayer gnome mummy grid bug
healer priest priestess
Wizard of Balance            

OBJECTS

Bell of Opening iron shoes murky potion

OTHER

Altar   Gnomish Mines wall   Gnomish Mines wall
  Gnomish Mines wall   Gnomish Mines wall      

The NetHack General Public License applies to screenshots, source code and other content from NetHack.

This content was modified from the original NetHack source code distribution (by splitting up NetHack content between wiki pages, and possibly further editing). See the page history for a list of who changed it, and on what dates.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=List_of_historic_vanilla_NetHack_tiles&oldid=8997"
